**Is your feature request related to a problem?**
A clear description of the problem. E.g. "I have to switch between ANKR Interact and Notion to..."

A clear description of what you want.

- [ ] Obsidian
- [ ] Notion

- [ ] Google Classroom
- [ ] Duolingo
- [ ] Miro
- [ ] Something else
